changelog.changes:
* Some crashes fixed
* Do not log temporary history in incognito mode (even temporary)
* Trick to make play/pause remote media button work (experimental)
* Fixed one problem of not opening magnet links on Android 11 and below
* Fixed downloading in private folder problem on Android 12
* Dropped support of Android 5.x

* Fixed crash on incognito mode switch
* Fixed History delete function (thank you @shark-yn)
* DRM content support fix
* Added Polish translation (thank you @BadOmen)
* Added Italian translation (thank you @Vladi69)
* Added some other minor missing translations
* Dependency & target android API level update

* Incognito mode implemented
* Settings: added option to keep screen always on (thank you  Sebastian Niemann for pull request !)
* German translation (thank you peat80 for pull request !)
* Fixed problem with voice recognition on android >= 11 (now look a bit changed but functionality recovered)
* Icon look changed to declare support for Ukraine (explanation by link in settings)
* v1.8.1: added WebView version info and "clear web cache" button to settings; bugfixes;
* v1.8.2: often crash fixed
